entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR-Client-Cpp will not compile with gcc 13 #49784
  • Perf regression: json #49782
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #49781
  • [blazor wasm] dotnet watch - System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity. #49780
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning when targeting .NET 8 and using token [action] or [controller] in [Http*] or [Route] attributes #49777
  • Rename Microsoft.AspNetCore.Testing #49776
  • Incompatible with UI client as angular version 16 with module federation plugin #49775
  • Missing workload check causes error for WasmLinkerTest project #49774
  • Blazor server memory leak occurs after page reloads #49773
  • SaveToken on JwtBearer Authentication Handler doesn't work if TokenValidated Event Sets Result #49769

Closed

  • RequestDelegateFactoryTests migration #47345
    8.0-preview6
  • Support for x-forwarded-prefix #23263
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #49767
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335
    8.0-rc1
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48461
    8.0-rc1
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32] MVCBlog is crashed with exception "Unable to resolve service for type 'XXX' while attempting to activate 'xxxController' #49485
  • Jscall blazor ssr .net 8-p6 closed connection #49665
  • OauthMiddleware contains 'Correlation failed' error; #49741

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.11 #49779
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.22 #49778
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `be03d00` to `6f6ab42` #49771
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `be03d00` to `6f6ab42` #49770
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Enable navigation when RenderModeServer #49768
    area-blazor
  • Rename SignalR transport metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49766
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Remove standard keyword #49700
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    area-networking, 8.0-rc1
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces references #49716
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Use Https instead of Http in InstallNode scripts #49764
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF/CR/LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Re-run routing for implicit middlewares that require endpoints #49732
    area-security, area-minimal, area-middleware
  • Improve ANCM file watcher thread management #49696
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2233723 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Rename Kestrel metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49747
    area-runtime
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename rate limiting middleware metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49749
    area-middleware
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Rename hosting, routing and error handling metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49743
    area-hosting
  • Add Keyed DI support to SignalR #49729
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] SSR unified routing #49622
    area-blazor
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement
